alert.note: Alert for Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bayfield County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Iron River, or 32 miles east of Superior, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Iron River around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ino. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
